message.content:
cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.RO, cs.DS, cs.CE 

The paper proposes a machine learning technique to accelerate the evaluation phase in heuristic approaches for the personnel scheduling problem, which is a well-known combinatorial optimization problem. The paper discusses the use of classifiers and boosting algorithms to improve the quality of the final solution. Therefore, the most likely sub-categories are cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.LG (Machine Learning), followed by cs.RO (Robotics and Automation) and cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms) due to the focus on optimization and heuristics. Finally, cs.CE (Computational Engineering, Finance, and Science) is also a possible sub-category due to the real-world applications of the proposed approach.
